name: Assyrian Confederation of Europe
goal: The Assyrian Confederation of Europe is an European umbrella organisation for Assyrian national federations and organisations in Europe. The main aims of the Assyrian Confederation of Europe are to promote Assyrian identity and culture in Europe, to represent the Assyrians of Europe in politics and media, and to support efforts in Assyria for democracy and equal rights.
interests: Culture, Development, Education, External Relations, Humanitarian Aid, Justice and Fundamental Rights
euInitiatives: Delegation for relations with Iraq. Situation in Syria. Issues concerning ethnic minorities and Christians in the Middle East.
